One day a magical creature appeared. It was called a 'permit'. This permit allowed the pick to do something special. The pick was now able to give the people something they wanted.
The people in the village were so excited. They had never seen anything like this before. They allowed the pick to give them what they wanted.
The pick granted everyone their wishes. Everyone was so happy, they laughed and cheered.
The mysterious pick and the permit had made everyone in the village very happy. They all thanked the magical creature for granting them their wishes.

One day, a stranger came to Tim's house. The stranger was big and looked difficult to talk to. Tim was scared of the stranger, so he hid behind a tree with his toy that could shoot.
Tim thought it would be fun to shoot at the stranger with his toy. But when he did, the stranger got very angry. The stranger came closer and took Tim's toy away. Tim was very sad and scared.
The stranger left with Tim's toy and never came back. Tim learned that it was not good to shoot at strangers. He missed his toy and wished he had not done that.

One day, a small child came across the lion's roar. She was walking far away from her home when she heard the lion's distant roar. The child was very frightened, but she was also curious. She quietly stepped closer to the lion, and she smiled when she saw the picture of a big lion standing before her.
The lion was so surprised to see the little girl that he didn't know what to do. He roared again, but the little girl just laughed.
The little girl and the lion became great friends. They would play and explore the distant land together.
